If memers were part of the Nine, Ser Laughing Fish would be Gandalf. Because he's a meme wizard.

I'd end up being one of the hobbits...
I'll be Sauron then >:D
So you will be killed by {{champion:17}} (Frodo)?

Frodo never actually faces Sauron to kill him though. He just chucks the ring into the volcano.

Fun fact!

In the original book, instead of throwing the ring into the volcano, Frodo instead jumped in **WITH** the ring. Committing suicide while destroying the ring.

.... But then as the ring melted he realized he was sitting in a pool of flowers surrounded by iridescent butterflies. And as tears formed in his dry eyes, he woke up. And realized it was all a horrible dream.

Pretty sure Hobbits are the most important ones in that movie. After all, a Hobbit destroyed the Ring.
https://49.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lqhj14cuLq1qhxaqyo1_500.gif
No, Gollum destroyed the ring in a supreme bit of fatal irony.
Gollum AKA Smeagol is a Hobbit.
Mr. Frodo! Gollum ain't no hobbit, he ain't no person! He'll backstab you the minute you're asleep!

It is a gifv, which is a gif processed like a video. It was originally a gif, but the boards put a limit on how large a gif can be, so I had to upload it to imgur and use their .gifv format to make the boards believe it is a video.
